com.mygdx.game.screens.game.ability

Class Abilities<S extends java.lang.Enum>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mygdx.game.screens.game.ability.Abilities<S>
  • Type Parameters:
    S - a State enum.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    StateListener<S>

    public class Abilities<S extends java.lang.Enum>
extends java.lang.Object
implements StateListener<S>
    Abilities manager. Defines when an ability begins or ends based on state by mapping state to ability calls.

      • addBegin

        public Abilities<S> addBegin(S state,
                             Ability<S> ability)
        Maps a state to an ability begin.
        Parameters:
        state - the new state being added.
        ability - the corresponding ability to the state.
        Returns:
        the current Abilities instance.

      • addEnd

        public Abilities<S> addEnd(S state,
                           Ability<S> ability)
        Maps a state to an ability end. Here, one state can end multiple abilities.
        Parameters:
        state - the new state being added.
        ability - the ability to end.
        Returns:
        the current Abilities instance.
